about_the_game:
On the night before Thanksgiving, a company by the name, VIRULENT INC., promised a good life to those who are unfortunate. Many signed up wanting the best for their families but did not get what VIRULENT INC. promised. Once they entered the factory, they all went missing. According to the government, they all turned into messed up experiments and are all still alive as strange creatures. You were sent to stop VIRULENT INC.'s experiments since you worked for their company in the past. They say that you are the BIND in between VIRULENT INC. and the anonymous company that sent you.

This game contains violence.
